State / Measuring network: * Pursuant to § 20 or § 21 of Directive 2008/50/EC, exceedances of the PM₁₀ daily mean limit value due to natural sources or gritted sand or salt may be deducted by winter road clearance services.

Source: German Environment Agency, https://www.umweltbundesamt.de/en/data/air/air-data/annual-tabulation (Status: 2012-03-26). All times are given in the time valid at the time of measurement (CET or CEST).
